items.title: Nissan and Honda consider merger to take on Toyota
items.description: A deal would effectively consolidate the Japanese auto industry into two main camps: One controlled by Honda, Nissan and Mitsubishi and another consisting of Toyota group companies

items.title: Shriram Finance seeks record $1.25 billion offshore loan split across currencies
items.description: The loan adds to this year’s rush of offshore debt sales by Indian shadow lenders after the nation’s central bank tightened rules in November 2023 that made it increasingly difficult for the sector to obtain local currency bank loans.

items.title: Why Aadhar Housing Finance is a sound long-term bet
items.description: Largest affordable housing finance player, yet undervalued.

items.title: Akzo Nobel India shares higher by 6% on report of $2-2.5 billion deal value for assets; Pidilite, JSW, Indigo in the fray
items.description: Shares of Akzo Nobel India, the maker of Dulux Paints, are witnessing strong buying interest as the race reportedly narrows down to three major players that are in the fray. Parent Akzo Nobel has hired Citigroup to conduct the India asset sale.

items.title: Mamata Machinery IPO: Proxy for emerging export opportunities in machinery
items.description: The company differentiates itself in the competitive packaging machinery market by offering customised co-extrusion and blow film solutions, allowing for tailored customer service rather than mass production

items.title: VA Tech Wabag shares off lows after Saudi authority says 'recalibrated' fresh tender for desalination project in 'couple of weeks'
items.description: VA Tech Wabag's orderbook was majorly boosted by the Saudi Water Authority tender, which will now be 'recalibrated', and a fresh tender will be floated in a couple of weeks to invite bids again.

items.title: KFin Technologies shares up 30% in a month, Jefferies says Buy on Asia expansion prospects
items.description: Financial servives platform KFin Tech's ambitious expansion plans in south-east Asia have caught investor's attention, and the company says it has 'strong potential' for global expansion in countries where it is already present.

items.title: Foxconn said to have approached Nissan to take controlling stake
items.description: Honda is considering several options that may also involve a capital tie-up or the establishment of a holding company, Executive Vice President Shinji Aoyama said on Wednesday.

items.title: Ethanol sourcing from sugar mills to be less this season, Centre also mulls lower-than-expected price hike: CNBC Awaaz
items.description: Leading sugar mills are staring at a dual setback, as Centre is prioritising ethanol procurement from cooperative mills over private companies, and is considering a less-than-expected price hike.
